function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased digitalization in the water sector due to the pandemic","Impact":"Potential for cyber threats and data security risks","Mitigation":"Enhanced cybersecurity measures and data encryption","Technologies":"Advanced encryption technologies, secure communication protocols","People":"Water sector organizations, digital service providers","Owner":"IT security teams, water sector management"},{"Description":"Transformation toward digitalization altering the Water-Human-Data Nexus","Impact":"Privacy concerns and data misuse risks","Mitigation":"Compliance with data privacy regulations, ethical data use guidelines","Technologies":"Privacy-enhancing technologies, data anonymization tools","People":"Water consumers, data analysts, water sector stakeholders","Owner":"Data protection authorities, water sector regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Unique opportunity to develop the water sector and catalyze key preparation for combating climate change","Impact":"Failure to capitalize on the opportunity may result in missed climate change adaptation measures","Mitigation":"Investment in sustainable water management practices, integration with climate change adaptation strategies","Technologies":"Remote sensing for climate monitoring, water conservation technologies","People":"Water sector policymakers, climate change adaptation planners","Owner":"Government agencies, environmental organizations"}]}
